title: MyJournal
description: I'm a big follower of RobinSharma, the leadership guru! One of the outstanding habit he always insist is that one should plan/reflect on his days through his personal journal!

title: Siruseri Runners

title: Offload Memory
description: I think in this fast moving world the technlogies, tools, framework, language and design patterns keep changing. It is very difficult for any human to recollect or remember all these in mind, so this is place where they can offload their memory.
